Description:
Detects PowerShell execution to set the ACL of a file or a folder

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Script Change Permission Via Set-Acl
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll') and (process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe')) and (command like '%set-acl %' and command like '%-aclobject %' and command like '%-path %'))
